title: Ghostbusters Ecto-1
desc:
The Ectomobile, or Ecto-1 is a 1959 Cadillac Miller-Meteor Futura Duplex limo-style endloader combination car (ambulance conversion) used in the 1984 film Ghostbusters and other Ghostbusters fiction.

Add the Ghostbusters Ecto-1 as a new police car. This vehicle has identical stats to the standard police car, except that team member seats are up to 3 and transport seats are down to 0.

[h1]Languages[/h1]
English
Spanish (Español)
